page.title: 11English Translation pp 2-5
page.content: P2. Media. Type of poetry particular to Wales -"Yr Englyn" in strict verse.Local poet Mr Ieuan Jones and example of his work. P3. Employment.Population about 450 without much work.Most women stay home.Those who work, work locally -at the school,in catering and local shops P4. Employment.Farming is the main employment for men.Others work in local building and small factories. Half school leavers in last 10 years have left the area to seek employment. P5. Entertainment.The local Eisteddfod -held annually involves many people in the organisation.Many competitions of singing, recitations,art and craft etc.Draws competitors from a wide area. Main competition -poetry writing,the winner is presented with a chair hand made by local craftsman.
